items.sentence: I suspect that Tom won\'t tell Mary why he did that.
I think that\'s exactly what Tom is expecting to do.
There\'s a very good chance it was Tom who did that.
There\'s not much doubt about the cause of the fire.
Tom started crying when I told him his dog had died.
I don\'t often make mistakes when writing in French.
Whatever happened to your grandfather\'s gold watch?
What were you like when you were thirteen years old?
Tom hasn\'t told me where he is planning to do that.
I\'m not the only one who didn\'t get enough to eat.
